name: La Fantomerie
description:
In a random generated maze try to collect as much coins as possible, but don't let the ghost near you !

You are dropped in a random generated maze and you have to find the exit, but be aware, this maze is haunted, as the ghost will get nearer, the sound of him will get louder and louder, escape the maze with as much money you can collect, the only rule is : DO NOT DIE.

This game created in a classic gameboy style has been made for a python competition, it is not meant to be a masterpiece but if you fell on this page i hope you will still enjoy it :D, every feedback is welcome as i might continue improving it.

The game assets are from :

https://opengameart.org/content/gameboy-tileset

8bit Syndrom - z3r0

https://opengameart.org/content/doll-house
